  Property 'prop1' does not exist on type 'IntrinsicAttributes & IntrinsicClassAttributes<BigGreeter> & { children?: ReactNode | undefined; }'.
file.tsx(16,39): error TS2532: Object is possibly 'undefined'.


==== file.tsx (3 errors) ====
    /// <reference path="/.lib/react.d.ts" />
    
    import React = require('react');
    
    class BigGreeter extends React.Component<{ }, {}> {
        render() {
            return <div>Default hi</div>;
        }
        greeting: string;
        ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2564: Property 'greeting' has no initializer and is not definitely assigned in the constructor.
    }
    
    // Error
    let a = <BigGreeter prop1="hello" />

    let b = <BigGreeter ref={(input) => { this.textInput = input; }} />
